channel.title: Updates on John Cosio
channel.description: Recent content in Updates on John Cosio

item.title: Website updates: February 2018
item.description: Hello! I’m here again. Adding some updates and changing some stuff around here. How are you doing? So I was thinking about some stuff. When I first created my website it was just so I can create one for myself. To be able to add to my resume. Thought it could come handy during interviews like “Hey I have experience with WordPress and stuff. Check my email I use my own domain” then I was learning a lot.
